Package socialmedia

Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • socialmedia.Post
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Comment, Endorsement
    public class Post
extends java.lang.Object
    The post class is used to create objects that represent users original posts on social media

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int numberPosts
      A private variable Integer that stores the number of posts on the social media platform

      A public constructor that creates a new post object
